title: Red Curry Peanut Sauce
directions: Heat oil in a small nonstick skillet over medium heat. Add curry paste, ginger and garlic. Cook, stirring constantly, until fragrant, about 2 minutes.
Combine broth, peanut butter, vinegar, tamari (or soy sauce) in a food processor or mini food processor. Add the curry mixture and process until smooth, about 20 seconds.
ingredients: ¼ cup unsalted chicken broth or vegetable broth
2 teaspoons reduced-sodium tamari or soy sauce (see Tip)
